definition: abbr. for Israel 以色列[Yi3 se4 lie4]
to use/by means of/according to/in order to/because of/at (a certain date or place)
to bear/to endure/to tolerate/to restrain oneself
to receive/to accept/to suffer/subjected to/to bear/to stand/pleasant/(passive marker)

sentences.english: This is intolerable, but it isn't an indictment of growth itself.
sentences.chinese: 這是難以忍受的，但它不能作爲控訴經濟增長的藉口。

sentences.english: I found the woman scarcely endurable.
sentences.chinese: 我覺得這個女人難以忍受。

sentences.english: Radiation in the mouth is one of the most brutal of cancer treatments.
sentences.chinese: 口腔化療是最讓人難以忍受的癌症治療手段之一。

sentences.english: Most of all, I hated that it had seeped into my personal life.
sentences.chinese: 最令人難以忍受的是我的私人生活開始受到影響。

sentences.english: He's a Catholic convert, and rather oppressively more papist than the Pope.
sentences.chinese: 了天主教，而且比教皇還要虔誠，叫人難以忍受。

sentences.english: He had nothing to do and found the boredom hardly endurable.
sentences.chinese: 他無可事事，他覺得這種無聊難以忍受。

sentences.english: John discovers and outside isolation that kind of feeling is unendurable.
sentences.chinese: 約翰發現與外界隔絕的那種感覺是難以忍受的。

sentences.english: Or maybe the child has gotten unbearable flack for his or her name from relatives or friends.
sentences.chinese: 或者孩子難以忍受親友對其名字的演繹。

sentences.english: She complained that her head ached intolerably.
sentences.chinese: 她說她頭疼得簡直難以忍受。

sentences.english: Energy Secretary Samuel Bodman. 'And unless we act, the situation will remain unsustainable.
sentences.chinese: 除非我們行動起來，否則形勢就會繼續令人難以忍受。

sentences.english: The 5-degree temperature was almost unbearable , keeping in mind my country's climate.
sentences.chinese: 想着我們國家的氣候，5度的天氣讓人難以忍受。

sentences.english: Censure is sometimes hader to bear than punishment.
sentences.chinese: 譴責有些時候比刑罰更難以忍受。

sentences.english: The pressure inside the old submarine was almost unendurable .
sentences.chinese: 老式潛艇內的壓力幾乎是難以忍受的。

sentences.english: People have told me to my face that my lifestyle is impossible.
sentences.chinese: 有人曾當面告訴我說我的生活方式是難以忍受的。

sentences.english: Her failure to get a better grade than her brother stuck in her craw.
sentences.chinese: 她的成績不比她哥哥的好，這真使她難以忍受。

sentences.english: I would rather live without these unbearable tensions.
sentences.chinese: 我寧願生活沒有這些難以忍受的緊張。
